  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82a153c722fb78b457b1d3c5adc32cf6b372e509</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82a153c722fb78b457b1d3c5adc32cf6b372e509</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Effect of lenses on rays of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekt der Objektive auf Strahlen des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effet des objectifs sur des rayons de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeito das lentes em raios da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto degli obiettivi sui raggi di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδραση των φακών στις ακτίνες του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efecto de lentes en rayos de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These ray diagrams show the effect of converging (left and right) and diverging (middle) lenses on rays of light.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diverging lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rays of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Strahldiagramme zeigen den Effekt der 
zusammenlaufenden (link und recht) und auseinanderlaufenden (Mitte) 
Objektive auf Strahlen des Lichtes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes de rayon montrent l'effet des 
objectifs de convergence (à gauche et à droite) et de divergence (de
milieu) sur des rayons de lumière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas do raio mostram o efeito de lentes
convergentes (esquerdas e direitas) e diverging (do meio) em raios da 
luz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi del raggio mostrano l'effetto degli 
obiettivi convergenti (a destra e a sinistra) e di divergenze (della 
metà) sui raggi di luce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα ακτίνων εμφανίζουν την επίδραση 
της σύγκλισης (αριστερά και δεξιός) και των μέσων) φακών 
απόκλισης (στις ακτίνες του φωτός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas del rayo muestran el efecto de las
lentes de convergencia (a la izquierda e a la derecha) y de 
divergencia (del centro) en rayos de la luz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">auseinanderlaufendes Objektiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Objektiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">parallele Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahldiagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlen des Lichtes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objectif de divergence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objectif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayons parallèles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diagramme de rayon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayons de lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raios da luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obiettivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggi paralleli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schema del raggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
